x, t = map(int, input().split())
if x - t >= 0:
    print(x - t)
else:
    print('Yes')

n = int(input())
heights = list(map(int, input().split()))

for i in range(1, n):
    if heights[i] < heights[i - 1]:
        heights[i] = heights[i - 1]

print("Yes")

n = int(input())
h = list(map(int, input().split()))
if n == 1:
    print('YES')
else:
    flag = True
    for i in range(1, n):
        if h[i] < h[i-1]:
            if h[i] < h[i-1] - 1:
                flag = False
                break
            else:
                h[i] = h[i-1]
    if flag:
        print('YES')
    else:
        print('NO')

n = int(input())
heights = list(map(int, input().split()))

for i in range(1, n):
    if heights[i] < heights[i - 1]:
        heights[i] = heights[i - 1]


print('Yes')


n = int(input())
h = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = True
for i in range(1, n):
    if h[i - 1] > h[i]:
        h[i] = h[i - 1]
    elif h[i - 1] == h[i]:
        continue
    elif h[i - 1] == h[i] + 1:
        ans = False
        break

if ans:
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")

n = int(input())
h = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = True
for i in range(1, n):
    if h[i - 1] > h[i]:
        h[i] = h[i - 1]
    elif h[i - 1] == h[i]:
        continue
    elif h[i - 1] + 1 < h[i]:
        ans = False
        break

if ans:
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")
